== Amarambalam (627476) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Amarambalam is a village in the [[Nilambur]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 14262 hectares and harbouring 7841 households with total population of 35975 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Manjeri]] is at a distance of 35 km. Male population is 17355 and female population is 18620. Scheduled Caste Population is 4192 and Scheduled Tribes population is 996. Census Location Code of the village is 627476<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 28796 (80.04%)
* Literate male population: 14150 (81.53%)
* Literate female population: 14646 (78.66%)
